response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $1,200,000 to you. I am extending this offer to you at a special price, reflecting my confidence in its unmatched quality and your discerning taste.

I propose to sell the product to you for $1,150,000. This represents a remarkable saving for you while ensuring a fair return for me. I believe this price reflects the product's true worth while allowing us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
